General.Name: NPD Co. Ltd
General.Description: NPD Co., Ltd operates in the surface mount technology business in South Korea. It offers FPCB module products, such as mobile phone FPCB Ass'y and mobile displays. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Cheonan, South Korea. As of October 31, 2016, NPD Co., Ltd operates as a subsidiary of S&K Polytec Co., Ltd.
